block.ctnhcore.nq_excite_carbon_carbon_n: Nq Excite Carbon Carbon Nanofiber Structural Block
ctnh.common_tooltip.advanced_mana_consum: Base consumption is 10mB of Liquid Mana per second. For each voltage tier above §7LV§r, the consumption doubles.
ctnh.common_tooltip.basic_mana_consume: Base consumption is 4mB of Liquid Mana per second. For each voltage tier above §7LV§r, the consumption doubles.
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_generator.0: Max power output = (Recipe base output) * (Rune multiplier) * (Rotor max RPM) * (Rotor efficiency/100) * (Machine bonus multiplier)
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_generator.1: Actual output = (Current rotor RPM / Max rotor RPM)^2 * Max power output
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_generator.2: §cWarning: Requires continuous Mana fluid consumption. Insufficient Mana will reduce output to 1/5 of normal. Check UI for consumption rate.
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_generator.3:
Inserting Runes into the machine boosts generation efficiency:
 Tier I Rune: Output×1.5, Mana cost×0.8, 20% decay chance per 5s
 Tier II Rune: Output×2.4, Mana cost×1.2, 10% decay chance per 5s
 Tier III Rune: Output×3, Mana cost×0.8, 5% decay chance per 5s
 Tier IV Rune: Output×4, Mana cost×0.6, 2.5% decay chance per 5s
 Tier V Rune: Output×5, Mana cost×0.3, 2% decay chance per 5s
 §5Quasar Rune§r: Output×999, Cost×999, §cBursts with final brilliance amidst devoured stars§r
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_machine.1: §cMana Machines no longer have any parallelism
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_machine.2: Each operational parallel provides 1% time and energy reduction, up to 75% maximum reduction
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_machine.3: §4When voltage is below LUV and recipe voltage tier matches current voltage, increases processing time by 50% (Mana Assembly only increases by 1%)
ctnh.common_tooltip.mana_machine.4: Insert §5Quasar Rune§r to activate §5Eye of Astral Mode§r for 100 recipes: Parallelism becomes unlimited, but no longer provides additional time or voltage reduction. Activating this mode doesn't consume the Quasar Rune
ctnh.common_tooltip.parallel_hatch: Voltage levels increase the number of parallels
ctnh.common_tooltip.steel_machine.0: Can only use HV-grade energy hatches and below
ctnh.common_tooltip.subtick_overclock: When recipe runtime is less than 1 tick, parallel calculations will be performed automatically.
ctnh.common_tooltip.super_mana_consume: Base consumption is 12mB of Liquid Mana per second. For each voltage tier above §7LV§r, the consumption doubles.
ctnh.common_tooltip.zenith_machine.1: After reaching LUV voltage, if §5Zenith Source Matter§r is sufficient, each operation will consume (60*(current voltage level-6)) Zenith Source Matter, gaining 2^(current voltage level-6) parallelism. The maximum parallelism depends on the current voltage. However, not inputting Zenith Source Matter will result in a loss of 4 parallelism.
ctnh.common_tooltip.zenith_machine.2: Warning: The consumption of Source Matter is unrelated to the number of items you input. Even without parallelism, your Zenith Source Matter will be deducted. After reaching the maximum parallelism, Zenith Source Matter will continue to be consumed, but the consumption rate will be fixed at 60.
ctnh.computer.a1: §cAll great works require§4 sacrifice§r§j to forge. Other beings may not understand, but they will§4 obey§r.
ctnh.computer.a3: Uses other intelligent beings as §4wetware§r for computation, gaining massive processing power, even converting them into wetware.
ctnh.computer.a5: This machine will overload the brains of all intelligent beings. §4Inevitable§r §4permanent damage§r to their brains,§4 no drops§r will be left.
ctnh.computer.a6: For beings like villagers, who are §7low-intelligence§r new humans, their life and intellect are too low. We need§c smarter, cuter, and more life-capable beings§r.
ctnh.computer.a7: For endless knowledge, we must§4 make all necessary sacrifices§4.
ctnh.me_advanced_terminal.tooltip.1: Can build multiblock structures using items from the ME network
ctnh.me_advanced_terminal.tooltip.2: Connects to the network via ME Wireless Access Point
ctnh.me_advanced_terminal.tooltip.3: Prioritizes items from the player's inventory
ctnh.multiblock.advanced_coke_oven.toolt: Can only run blast furnace recipes, and recipe time is fixed at 15 seconds
Produces a large amount of coke products and phenolic oil
ctnh.multiblock.astronomical.info.invali: Can only be used at night
ctnh.multiblock.astronomical.tooltip.0: Knowing the heavens is easy, but defying them is difficult
ctnh.multiblock.astronomical.tooltip.1: Cannot work under direct sunlight, but will automatically collect data for the chips in the chip bus while working
ctnh.multiblock.blaze_blast_furnace.tool: Faster than an electric blast furnace.
Base consumption is §a10mB§r of Blazing Pyrotheum per second. For each voltage tier above §6HV§r, the consumption doubles.
ctnh.multiblock.coke_tower.tooltip.0: Boasts formidable coking capacity to fuel your petrochemical production line!
ctnh.multiblock.coke_tower.tooltip.1: Delivers blistering speeds rivaling industrial furnaces
ctnh.multiblock.crystallizer.tooltip.1: The crystallizer completes crystal recipes more efficiently.
ctnh.multiblock.crystallizer.tooltip.2: Efficiency improves as the coil level increases.
ctnh.multiblock.crystallizer.tooltip.3: Can process chemical vapor deposition recipes and some autoclave recipes.
ctnh.multiblock.crystallizer.tooltip.4: The best assistant for saving materials.
ctnh.multiblock.cultivation_room.tooltip: Utilize this machine to cultivate hard-to-obtain fungi and bacteria
ctnh.multiblock.decay_pools.tooltip.1: When the circuit board is set to 0, the machine is unpowered and world acceleration is disabled.
ctnh.multiblock.decay_pools.tooltip.2: When the circuit board is set to 1, the machine is powered and world acceleration is enabled.
ctnh.multiblock.demon_will_generator.too: Generates power by utilizing the difference in demonic will concentration between the chunks on either side of the machine. The power generation increases exponentially with the concentration difference.
Calculations are based on the will concentration at the demonic alloy blocks on either side of the machine.
The diversity of various demonic wills in the chunks on both sides affects power generation efficiency.
Will cores can be placed inside the machine, transforming it into a specialized mode focused on a specific type of will.

The rune blocks inside the machine can be replaced to provide different enhancements:
§4Sacrifice Runes and Self-Sacrifice Runes§r----Increase the power generation multiplier for the Life Essence Fortified Mode§r
§3Speed Runes§r----Increase the duration of a single recipe operation (saving demonic will consumption)§r
§eAugment Runes§r----Each rune increases the demonic will concentration difference by 1§r
§cSupercharge Runes§r----Each rune increases the demonic will concentration difference by 5% (multiplied)§r
==============================
Insert §4Life Essence§r to activate the Fortified Mode, doubling power output while consuming §a100mb§r of Life Essence per second.
ctnh.multiblock.desalting_factory.toolti: Drying salt out of seawater—eco-friendly, isn't it?
ctnh.multiblock.digestion_tank.tooltip.0: Actually, it produces very valuable materials...
ctnh.multiblock.digestion_tank.tooltip.1: Composting Mechanism of the Digestion Tank:
ctnh.multiblock.digestion_tank.tooltip.2: The optimal growth temperature is between §236§r and §238§r degrees. Recipes get 1.2x efficiency at optimal temperature. The further it deviates, the lower the efficiency, down to one-third.
ctnh.multiblock.eternal_well_of_suffer.t: §8Satan woke up to find himself demoted to second place.§r
Enjoy the anguished screams of the suffering souls.§r
Recipe time is always fixed at 1s. Increasing the voltage tier will boost the production of Vital Essence, equivalent to lossless overclocking.§r
Using an incomplete Data Model yields no output. Higher model levels result in greater production.
In Soul Mode, the machine does not produce Vital Essence but provides Will to the §bIndustrial Hellforge§r below.
Both machines must share the same lava pool, and the controller must be positioned directly above the Hellforge. Please consult JEI for more details.
Outputs Will equal to the Vital Essence production (mB)/100,000.
A tank designed specifically for microbial growth. Always keep an eye on it!
Biological Growth Mechanism of the Fermenting Tank:
The optimal growth temperature is between §236§r and §238§r degrees. Recipes get 1.2x efficiency at optimal temperature. The further it deviates, the lower the efficiency, down to one-third.

Microbial growth follows the logistic equation. When the liquid volume in the input tank is half of its capacity, §2growth efficiency doubles§r. Efficiency is lowest when the tank is full or empty, with a minimum of 20%.
ctnh.multiblock.forest_sea.tooltip.1: Plant trees by hand, create shade for millennia
ctnh.multiblock.forest_sea.tooltip.2: The Forest Sea is a massive machine that consumes only water to produce large quantities of lumber
ctnh.multiblock.forest_sea.tooltip.3: Performs water storage check every 5 seconds
ctnh.multiblock.forest_sea.tooltip.4: When water is sufficient, increases humidity by 1%
ctnh.multiblock.forest_sea.tooltip.5: When water is insufficient, decreases humidity by 10%
ctnh.multiblock.forest_sea.tooltip.6: Recipe processing time remains constant, but parallel value increases with humidity and voltage tier
ctnh.multiblock.hellforge.tooltip.1: Running Hellforge recipes requires meeting the minimum Will requirements.§r
ctnh.multiblock.hellforge.tooltip.2: How to fill the machine with Will:§r
ctnh.multiblock.hellforge.tooltip.3: 1. Kill a mob soaked in §cVital Essence§r near the controller using the §bSword of Perception§r. Will gained is based on the mob's max health.
ctnh.multiblock.hellforge.tooltip.4: §8The Manhattan distance to the controller must be less than 8; it doesn’t necessarily have to be the central blood chalice.§r
ctnh.multiblock.hellforge.tooltip.5: 2. Throw a Soulstone near the controller. The machine will absorb the Will automatically.
ctnh.multiblock.hellforge.tooltip.6: 3. Use the §4Eternal Well of Suffering§r. Please refer to the tooltip of the respective machine.§r
ctnh.multiblock.hyper_plasma_turbine.too: §5FINAL FANTASY §fof §a Precise Computation §f and §e Plasma Energy
Provide %d computation to reach the Base Production. For every %d computation provided, the Output Production DOUBLES.
ctnh.multiblock.industrial_altar.tooltip:
Like the Blood Altar, this structure has an LP input limit. You §4must§r use specific recipes to increase its LP§r
See JEI for the recipes that increase LP.
Every time the voltage exceeds HV, the LP storage limit increases by 10,000. When reaching LUV, each level increases by 30,000.
Each capacity rune increases the LP storage limit by 2500, and the enhanced capacity rune increases it by 5000. After reaching LUV, each level adds an extra 10,000/20,000 LP limit.
ctnh.multiblock.industrial_primitive_bla: A more powerful primitive blast furnace, your best helper for steelmaking
The industrial primitive blast furnace will continuously heat up while running a recipe, and will cool down rapidly once the process is stopped
The higher the temperature, the higher the parallelism of the industrial primitive blast furnace, up to a maximum of 8 parallelism
The higher the temperature, the higher the efficiency of the industrial primitive blast furnace, up to a maximum of double efficiency
ctnh.multiblock.large_bottle.tooltip.0: This is truly a large container.
ctnh.multiblock.large_bottle.tooltip.1: Can store up to 10,000 buckets of liquid.
ctnh.multiblock.large_bottle.tooltip.2: When used with a large fermenting tank, its liquid will be consumed at a rate of §e100mb/s§r.
ctnh.multiblock.large_fermenting_tank.to: Can connect auxiliary structures. By attaching a large fermentation bottle with a specific liquid type, the minimum efficiency increases: Water (50%), Basic Medium (150%), Sterile Medium (200%).
ctnh.multiblock.large_gas_collection_cha: This machine can collect gases from any dimension
Since its output is large, it is recommended to use an ME Output Assembly to collect the products
Heard you're worried about the source of minerals?
Converts mana into liquid mana or vice versa - the latter requiring significantly more energy
All mana I/O operations are processed through the central mana pool in the structure
ctnh.multiblock.mana_generator_turbine_t: Consumes 2.25× fuel but generates 4× power output when operating
Consumes 3× fuel but generates 16× power output when operating
Consumes 4× fuel but generates 24× power output when operating
ctnh.multiblock.martial_morality_eye.too: Poor version of the Primordial Eye
Consumes 64000mb of steam and 64 raw stones in the early stages
Produces ores from the Overworld, Twilight Forest, and the Moon
Unlocks more recipes as the voltage level increases
More useful than falling stars in the early stages
The center of the structure seems to emanate a mysterious force, filled with an aura of danger. Stay away!
ctnh.multiblock.meadow.tooltip.1: Can only raise chickens, cows, pigs and sheep. Cows produce leather, sheep produce wool, pigs produce pork and chickens produce eggs.
ctnh.multiblock.meadow.tooltip.2: The more animals in the pasture, the more waste they generate. The more animals you have, the more byproducts are produced.
ctnh.multiblock.meadow.tooltip.3: Only when the animals run away can you know that you are not farming!
ctnh.multiblock.mega_lcr.tooltip.0: For each actual parallel operation, reduces energy consumption by 2% (up to 75% max) and processing time by 2% (up to 75% max) while the machine is running
ctnh.multiblock.mega_lcr.tooltip.1: When coil temperature exceeds 3600K, every additional 1800K provides an extra 25% speed boost
ctnh.multiblock.nano_generator.tooltip.0: Utilize the power of friction heat
ctnh.multiblock.nano_generator.tooltip.2:
For each parallel count, the overall power generation increases by 0.2%
Actual operation time is recipe time * sqrt(parallel count)
ctnh.multiblock.nano_generator.tooltip.3:
Inserting specific materials into the machine can enhance the multiplier, but also has a chance of consumption
No material: 0.4 multiplier
Rubber sheet: 0.8 multiplier, consumption chance per 512 parallel count
Polyethylene sheet: 1.2 multiplier, consumption chance per 1024 parallel count
Silicone rubber sheet: 2.0 multiplier, consumption chance per 4096 parallel count
Styrene-butadiene rubber sheet: 3.2 multiplier, consumption chance per 65535 parallel count
Polybenzimidazole sheet: 5 multiplier, consumption chance per 1048576 parallel count
Generates power using supercharged fuel - cannot fully consume fuel without nickel plasma
A power core must be present in the machine configuration
As the core temperature increases, power generation efficiency improves
ctnh.multiblock.nicoll_dyson_beams.toolt: §9Arcane Pivot Colossus - Reshaping the Fabric of Scale§r
Supports parallel control pods, §cwhich don't provide recipe parallelism§r, only modifying mana input per second
Overload decreases by 1 every 3 sec when stable. §cMachine explodes at maximum overload!§r
Consumes 100*parallelism Kmb(B) liquid mana/sec for beam energization. Non-mana coolant recipes can power the machine
Warning: Excess mana beyond capacity won't be refunded. Surplus mana above capacity won't be consumed during operation
Inserted §9Tier V Runes§r determine various machine capabilities
§9Starlight Rune§r energy reduces power consumption and enhances machine stability
§cDistortion Rune§r energy decreases processing time and increases mana injection frequency, §cat the cost of reduced stability§r
§dHorizon Rune§r energy significantly increases mana capacity and utilization efficiency
§5Quasar Rune§r energy forces the machine into §coverload state§r while decupling recipe requirements, output, and voltage
The interplay between §cDistortion§r and §9Starlight§r determines machine stability
Stability formula: -((twist_power/3)+((mana/100000)*(Math.max(twist_power/9,1))))+starlight_power*4+5+tier. Machine overloads when stability <0!
§cOverload§r increases by 1/sec; §crecipe duration doubles§r during overload
ctnh.multiblock.photovoltaic_power_stati: Operates only during daytime. Efficiency varies across dimensions. Base output reflects noon in the Overworld
Operates only during daytime. Efficiency varies across dimensions. Base output reflects noon in the Overworld
Operates only during daytime. Efficiency varies across dimensions. Base output reflects noon in the Overworld
ctnh.multiblock.plasma_condenser.tooltip: The dense air condenses into frost and dew
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.0: §9Mana's§r §cUltimate Mystery§r, a device capable of creating §5quasars§r now rests in §6your§r hands
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.1: Machine activation requires §rinitial mana fuel consumption§R, consult JEI for specific values
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.10: In creation mode, releases all stored EU. Advanced fuels multiply output. Every 1000E EU generates bonus gas byproduct. Creation mode disabled when stored EU <1E
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.11: §bGood news§r: This machine won't explode. §cBut no guarantees for future versions!§r
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.2: Activating lower-tier recipes at high energy tiers §bwaives activation costs§r
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.3: §5Rune Energy§r governs output potency. Input §bTier V Runes§r to amplify rune energy and enhance outputs. Use §5Quasar Runes§r to generate massive rune energy
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.4: Rune energy acquisition logic: §5Before each recipe cycle§r, consumes §cup to one§r of each consumable rune type
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.5: §cWarning§r: Higher rune energy accelerates §cdepletion rate§r. Efficiency §chalves§r when rune energy falls below 50!
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.6: Energy efficiency formula: log((rune_energy)/50)+1. Max efficiency: (1 + energy tier)
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.7: Features time parallelism. Both consumption and duration multiply by parallel factor (efficiency*5)
ctnh.multiblock.quasar_eye.tooltip.9: In generation mode, accumulates 1% of EU output into the Quasar Eye. Gains +1% accumulation per 25 rune energy
From §bA certain mysterious eastern country§r's industrial power.
Gray employees don’t deceive gray employees, parallel is real.
No shell level requirements, recipes don't need catalysts.
Parallel count is related to the central block.
Each point of actual parallel reduces energy consumption and operation time by 0.5%, up to a maximum reduction of 25% (independently multiplied)
Each coil providing 1800K increases the operation speed by +50%
ctnh.multiblock.sintering_kiln.tooltip.0: Requires 8,192 Stress to activate internal pistons for compacting materials
When powered spawners are placed in the input bus, the machine will automatically output corresponding mob drops. Multiple powered spawners can be inserted
Each voltage tier increase adds +4 to virtual spawn count (HV provides 4)
Higher mob health and armor values will increase processing time
Weapon damage and enchantments will reduce processing time
Fortune and other enchantments also take effect
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.0: Means of Production and Surplus Value
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.1: The number of villagers in the factory determines efficiency. Recipe time x (2 / number of villagers)
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.2: The effective number of workers in the factory is limited by the factory size. Initial limit: 4 workers; for every 4 blocks added to the factory length, the limit increases by 1.
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.3:
The production materials (machines) placed determine the available recipes:
Powered Rolling Machine ---- Rolling Mill Recipes
Powered Mixer ---- Mixer Recipes
Lathe ---- Lathe Recipes
Centrifuge ---- Extractor Recipes
Blaze Burner ---- Extractor Recipes
Work Basin ---- Fluid Forming Recipes
Crushing Wheel ---- Grinder Recipes
Powered Saw ---- Wire Rolling Machine Recipes
Laser Processor ---- Laser Etching Recipes
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.4: The number of production materials (machines) placed determines the parallelism of corresponding recipes: Parallelism = sqrt(number of machines)
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.5: Adding robotic arms improves the overall recipe execution speed. Recipe time x (1 / 1 + 0.25 * sqrt(number of robotic arms))
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.6: The diversity of machines placed improves recipe execution speed.
ctnh.multiblock.sweat_shop.tooltip.7: Every 5 seconds, machines consume (number of workers) servings of simple worker meals.
ctnh.multiblock.twisted_fusion_mk1.toolt: No start-up energy required, no room level restrictions, perform 4/2 overclocking. Provides parallel depending on recipe start-up energy:
Greater than 160MEU, less than 320MEU: 4+4*fusion reactor level parallel
Greater than 320MEU, less than 480MEU: 1+fusion reactor level parallel
Follows the law of conservation of letters.
Perhaps this can be used to produce some §9strange things§r...
ctnh.multiblock.twisted_fusion_mk_infini: Applies §8incomprehensible§r parallel to all recipes, reducing energy consumption and operation time by 75%
§5You must be crazy to make this machine, and indeed this machine is equally crazy§r.
ctnh.multiblock.underfloor_heating_syste: Reduce the consumption of steam to reduce the heating power of the floor heating
The underfloor heating system uses steam for heating. Occupying one chunk, it can heat §aa 5×5 chunk area§r around it. Heating only works within 10 blocks above the system
Copper brick tiles will rust over time, reducing the heating efficiency of the system when rusted
Adjustable rate allows reducing heating power and steam consumption, with minimum setting at 25%
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.0: Harvesting heaven’s materials, digging the earth’s essence
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.1: The Void Miner automatically generates and extracts ores
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.2: If you have a huge demand for minerals, the Void Miner is an essential helper
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.3: Input 100,000,000mB of drilling fluid at once, Cryotheum and Pyrotheum will be consumed during temperature adjustment
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.4: When the temperature reaches 25,000K, the Void Miner will enter forced cooling mode. Please alternate between inputting Pyrotheum and Cryotheum to control the temperature
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.5: When the temperature drops to 0K, the Void Miner will return to normal operation mode
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.6: Initial Pyrotheum consumption is 100mb. If successfully consumed, the energy will increase by ⌊(Pyrotheum / 100)⌋, then Pyrotheum will multiply by 1.02
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.7: Initial Cryotheum consumption is 100mb. If successfully consumed, the energy will decrease by ⌊(Cryotheum / 100)⌋, then Cryotheum will multiply by 1.02
ctnh.multiblock.void_miner.tooltip.8: The higher the temperature, the higher the efficiency of the Void Miner
ctnh.multiblock.water_power_station.tool: Power generation is proportional to the amount of water within a radius equal to the machine length and height of 4, centered on the controller.
Power output fluctuates randomly between a multiplier of 0.6 to 1.
ctnh.multiblock.wide_accelerator.tooltip: Supports §9laser pods§r and §avoltage converter pods§r, cannot be overclocked
WARNING: Extreme power consumption. Improper voltage may cause §crecipe failure§r or §ccircuit tripping§r. Recommended with §9laser pods§r. Reduce parallelism if malfunction occurs
Particle transfer available via containment links. §cCAUTION: Hazardous recipes require pre-installed containment systems§r (Currently conceptual)
Accelerates three particle types simultaneously through triple beamlines
Requires particle velocity exceeding recipe specifications, with maximum threshold of 50GeV
§bParallel control pods§r enable customized recipe/acceleration parallelism, otherwise uses default values
Insufficient particle velocity yields no products
Operational logic varies by selected recipe mode
ACCELERATION MODE: Default 1024-parallelism. Energy cost increases 10% per 100MeV combined velocity. §9Particle velocity remains constant§r during operation
DECELERATION MODE: Default single-parallelism. Energy cost increases 2.5% per 100MeV. Reduces particle velocity by sqrt(required velocity) post-operation
ctnh.multiblock.wind_array.tooltip0: §7§oWind Wolf: The TRUE POWER of NATURE
ctnh.multiblock.wind_array.tooltip10: §fLubricant will be extracted from the network.
ctnh.multiblock.wind_array.tooltip11: §5DO OBEY the rules to resist the DESTRUCTION from nature force.
ctnh.multiblock.wind_array.tooltip6: §fAll boosts are multiplied to determine production.
ctnh.multiblock.wind_array.tooltip9: §fAligned structure within a distance of <= 1 form a Wind Network.
Allows the use of §5Magical Resonance Circuit Assembly§r to assemble resonant circuits at lower voltages and with special materials
ctnh.multiblock.zenith_laser.tooltip.0: Allows the use of §5Inverse Etching§r, consuming §5Zenith Source Matter§r to turn chips into wafers
ctnh.testing_terminal.tooltip.1: Use to check the error when building the multiblock
ctnh.testing_terminal.tooltip.2: Right-click the controller to show the error info
ctnh.tooltips.simplecomputationmachine: Requires 2^(recipe level - HV) CWU/t when handling recipes which tier is no lower than HV
enchantment.kubejs.vacuum_seal.desc: Protects you from vacuum damage. Note: All equipped items must have this enchantment to take effect
gtceu.multiblock.laser.tooltip: The use of the laser chamber is permitted
